lead_paragraph: Markets in Europe were also down as investors fretted over the debt crisis in Greece. A report showed soft demand for durable goods in the United States.

headline.print_headline: Greece and a Rising Dollar Drive Shares Down
headline.main: Greece and a Rising Dollar Drive Shares Steeply Lower

snippet: Markets in Europe were also down as investors fretted over the debt crisis in Greece. A report showed soft demand for durable goods in the United States.
abstract: Stocks decline at steepest rate in three weeks as investors respond to uncertainty over Greece's debt crisis and surge in value of dollar.
